item.title: Katherine add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "It never got weird enough for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "In the spring, at the end of the day, you should smell like dirt." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Martin Amis
item.description: "And meanwhile time goes about its immemorial work of making everyone look and feel like shit." -- Martin Amis

item.title: Katherine add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Anthony Bourdain
item.description: "your body is not a temple, it's an amusement park. Enjoy the ride." -- Anthony Bourdain

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Kim Malthe-Bruun
item.description: ". . . and I want you all to remember--that you must not dream yourselves back to the times before the war, but the dream for you all, young and old, must be to create an ideal of human decency, and not a narrow-minded and prejudiced one. That is the great gift out country hungers for, something every little peasant boy can look forward to, and with pleasure feel he is a part of--something he can work and fight for." -- Kim Malthe-Bruun
